entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:47 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 05:48 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
